body_html: @colesbury, @SsnL and I had an offline conversation about this and we'll probably end up just making another function at::maybe_ptr or at::data_ptr (so we don't have to deal with implementation weirdness making a certain method on undefined tensor actually work.)

body: @colesbury, @SsnL and I had an offline conversation about this and we'll probably end up just making another function `at::maybe_ptr` or `at::data_ptr` (so we don't have to deal with implementation weirdness making a certain method on undefined tensor actually work.)
